Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class does everything a player can do in the game
Author:
Exconde and Soemadipradja

    • checkWithered

      public void checkWithered(Tile tile)
      Sets a tile's wither to true if the plant was not harvested in time or if it was not watered or fertilized enough at the day of harvest
      Parameters:
      tile - the (singular) plot of land that is chosen by the player

      public void water(Tool wateringcan, Tile tile)
